```{r}
#libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
#install.packages("ipumsr")
library(ipumsr)

```

```{r}

#Loading in the data from 22-23 season

wbb_rosters_22_23 <- read_csv("data/wbb_rosters_2022_23.csv")
head(wbb_rosters_22_23)
```


```{r}
#state counts

wbb_rosters_22_23 %>% 
group_by(state_clean) %>%
filter(state_clean == "MD") %>% 
count()
##Maryland has 350


wbb_rosters_22_23 %>% 
group_by(state_clean) %>%
count() %>% 
arrange(desc(n))
#1073 NAs


```
